mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by id DESC) as rowNo, t14.employeeNo, t14.id, CONCAT(t1.employeeFristName, t1.employeeLastName) as employeeName, t14.additionMoneyCode, t14.additionNumberOfTimesStatus, t14.startYearAndMonth, t14.additionMoneyResonCode, t14.createTime, (select admissionStartDate from T006EmployeeSiteInfo tt6 where tt6.employeeNo=t14.employeeNo order by admissionStartDate DESC limit 1) admissionStartDate, (select workstate from T006EmployeeSiteInfo tt6 where tt6.employeeNo=t14.employeeNo order by admissionStartDate DESC limit 1) workState, (select t7.customerAbbreviation from T011BpInfoSupplement t11 left join T007CustomerInfo t7 on t11.bpBelongCustomerCode = t7.customerNo where t11.bpEmployeeNo=t14.employeeNo order by bpOtherCompanyAdmissionEndDate DESC limit 1 ) as belongCustomerName FROM T014SalesMoneySetting t14 left join T001Employee t1 on t14.employeeNo=t1.employeeNo order by t14.createTime DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T014SalesMoneySetting ( employeeNo, additionMoneyCode, additionNumberOfTimesStatus, startYearAndMonth, additionMoneyResonCode, updateTime, createTime, updateUser) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, #{additionMoneyCode}, #{additionNumberOfTimesStatus}, #{startYearAndMonth}, #{additionMoneyResonCode}, date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), #{updateUser});
mapper.update: UPDATE T014SalesMoneySetting SET employeeNo = #{employeeNo}, additionMoneyCode = #{additionMoneyCode}, additionNumberOfTimesStatus = #{additionNumberOfTimesStatus}, startYearAndMonth = #{startYearAndMonth}, additionMoneyResonCode = #{additionMoneyResonCode}, updateTime= date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), updateUser = #{updateUser} WHERE id = #{id};
